caption.title:
Autocorrelation function (ACF) plot of the residuals with
2 /
T
bounds.
caption.p: The plots along the diagonal are the individual ACFs for each modelâ€™s residuals, the remaining subplots show the cross-correlations between pairwise residuals. Here T is the sample size. The plots suggests randomness of the residuals, indicating a good fitting of the VAR model.
